magicLinkDesc: Enter your email and we'll send you a login link
heroSubtitle: Join challenges, track progress and compete with the team

toast.alreadyRegistered: User already registered. Try signing in instead.
toast.invalidEmail: Invalid email. Please check your email address.
toast.weakPassword: Password too simple. Minimum 6 characters required.
toast.checkEmail: Check your email. We sent a confirmation link. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.
toast.oauthConfigError: Google OAuth not configured. Add callback URL to Google Cloud Console.
toast.oauthSetupError: OAuth setup error. Site URL and Redirect URLs need to be configured in Supabase.
toast.networkError: Network error. Check your internet connection and try again.
toast.googleSignInGenericError: Google error. Try again later or use email sign in.
toast.magicLinkSent: Magic link sent to {{email}}. Check your email!
